attributes.action: Ban playing music too loud in cars as this is a distraction and blocks sense of hearing which is vital when driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently a friend of mines, a biker, had been knocked down by a driver because the driver did not hear his motor bike coming up the side of him as he had his music blasting, it litterally caused his windows to vibrate!
Music should be kept to a certain dB when in cars.
Playing music at above 100dB is simply un-acceptable, this causes distress to other road users and citizens, that is about the same volume that is created by a jet taking off a landing strip!
This can also eradicate the function of the drivers pernament hearing, I personally feel if you do not have the ability to hear, you should not be driving alone as this can prove dangerous in itself! 

Loud music kills.
